name: Fire Escape (itch) (StormTruck)
description:
Imagine being stuck in a large building on fire. What would you do?

Fire Escape is a game where you learn about fire safety in a worst case scenario. Do you bring your belongins with you or do you run straight for the exit?

The game was made in 2 months by Second year students of Nord University. The requirement of the game was serious game: a game where the objective is to inform the player about a important topic / subject.
